charges.charge_description: 18 USC 2244(a)(1) and (5), 2244(c), and 1153 ABUSIVE SEXUAL CONTACT(1s-2s)

charges.charge_disposition: 180 months on count 1 and 180 months on count 2 to run consecutive for a total of 360 months imprisonment, Lifetime supervised release, $200 special assessment, remand to the United States Marshal

charges.charge_disposition: dismissed per filing of the Information
